trans-unit.source: The entered values ​​are equal. Please change one of these values. Or change the command to allow decimal values.
trans-unit.target: Les valeurs saisies sont égaux. S'il vous plaît modifier une des valeurs suivantes. Ou modifier la commande afin de permettre des valeurs décimales.

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is greater than the maximum value. Please fix it!
trans-unit.target: La valeur minimale est supérieure à la valeur maximale. S'il vous plaît le fixer !

trans-unit.source: Minimum value is greater than maximum.
trans-unit.target: Valeur minimale est supérieure à la concurrence.

trans-unit.source: Plese, check the number written, cause something went wrong. Make sure that you used only one "." or ",". Both ("." or ",") isn't allowed.
trans-unit.target: Plese, vérifiez le numéro inscrit, causer quelque chose a mal tourné. Assurez-vous que vous avez n'utilisé qu'un seul ". « ou »,". Les deux (". « ou »,") n'est pas autorisé.

trans-unit.source: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.
trans-unit.target: N'est pas en de rares occasions où nous devons donner que quelqu'un avec cette application est facile. Il suffit d'ajouter les numéros de pistes à tirer et il fera le travail pour vous. L'essayer.
trans-unit.note: Não é raro ocasiões onde precisamos sortear alguém, com esse aplicativo fica fácil. Basta adicionar a faixa de números a serem sorteados e ele fará o trabalho para você. Experimente.

trans-unit.source: Get to know me and my other apps by visiting my website.
trans-unit.target: Faire connaissance avec moi et mes autres applications en visitant mon site.

trans-unit.source: Make someone happy by rating this app in the store. ;)
trans-unit.target: Rendre quelqu'un heureux par cette application dans le magasin de notation. ;)

trans-unit.source: Rate it and make someone happy
Please send me you feedback about this app. I am going to fix every bug and I will listen your ideias in how to make this app better.
trans-unit.target: S'il vous plaît envoyez-moi vous commentaires sur cette application. Je vais pour corriger tous les bogues et j'écouterai vos ideias dans Comment améliorer cette application.

trans-unit.source: You can set up a minimum value and a max value. Some examples for you: 4, 8.15, 16.2342, 108.54
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir une valeur minimale et une valeur maximale. Quelques exemples pour vous: 4, 16.2342, 8.15, 108.54

trans-unit.source: You can set a timer for changing number every second or you can define how many seconds wait until choose a new number.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez régler une minuterie pour modifier le nombre par seconde ou vous pouvez définir le nombre de secondes attendre jusqu'en choisir un nouveau numéro.

trans-unit.source: Windows developer (C#, .Net, XAML and SQL Server), social media and web master. Work for myself. Read my social accounts and you gonna discover more who I am.
trans-unit.target: Windows developer (C#, .Net, XAML and SQL Server), social media and web master. Work for myself. Read my social accounts and you gonna discover more who I am.

trans-unit.source: Combining regular and irregular verbs of our Portuguese language in all tenses (Present, Imperfect, Perfect Present, more-than-perfect past, future, future of this, the present conditional, imperfect subjunctive tense, future subjunctive, imperative , infinitive and gerund).
trans-unit.target: Combining regular and irregular verbs of our Portuguese language in all tenses (Present, Imperfect, Perfect Present, more-than-perfect past, future, future of this, the present conditional, imperfect subjunctive tense, future subjunctive, imperative , infinitive and gerund).
trans-unit.note: Conjugue verbos regulares e irregulares da nossa língua portuguesa em todos os tempos verbais (Presente, Pretérito imperfeito, Pretérito perfeito, pretérito mais-que-perfeito, futuro, futuro do presente, presente do conjuntivo, pretérito imperfeito do conjuntivo, futuro do conjuntivo, imperativo, infinitivo e gerúndio). *** Por favor, não use esse aplicativo para colar na prova, ou use, mas por sua conta em risco ***

trans-unit.source: Hey, here is some of my thoughts on your app, and how can you improve it:
trans-unit.target: Hey, here is some of my thoughts on your app, and how can you improve it:

trans-unit.source: Those who never played such a game like this or have never heard that throw the first stone! The best game of truth and consequence that the Windows Store has seen so far, has several bottles according to the occasion (in family, in the square, between friends, drunk, with the bests , alone,in the classroom and among couples) , with questions and pre-defined challenges is fun in the right esste application!
trans-unit.target: Those who never played such a game like this or have never heard that throw the first stone! The best game of truth and consequence that the Windows Store has seen so far, has several bottles according to the occasion (in family, in the square, between friends, drunk, with the bests , alone,in the classroom and among couples) , with questions and pre-defined challenges is fun in the right esste application!
trans-unit.note: Quem nunca jogou um jogo desses ou nunca ouviu falar, que jogue a primeira pedra? O melhor jogo de verdade e consequência que a Windows Store já viu, possui diversas garrafas de acordo com a ocasião (em família, na praça, entre amigos, entre bêbados, com as bests, sozinho, em sala de aula e entre casais), com perguntas e desafios pre definidos é diversão na certa esste aplicativo!

trans-unit.source: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds. Perfect app for those who like to do marathons series and need to know how many episodes you can watch up to your next appointment, or you going to the movies and you want to eat something later, but can not miss the bus schedule. Do not waste time counting!
trans-unit.target: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds. Perfect app for those who like to do marathons series and need to know how many episodes you can watch up to your next appointment, or you going to the movies and you want to eat something later, but can not miss the bus schedule. Do not waste time counting!
trans-unit.note: Calcule e converta com facilidade minutos, transforando em horas, dias, anos ou até segundos. Aplicativo perfeito para você que gosta de fazer maratonas de séries e precisa saber quantos episódios você pode assistir até o seu próximo compromisso, ou para você que vai ao cinema e pretende comer algo depois, mas não pode perder o horário do ônibus. Não perca mais contando o tempo!

trans-unit.source: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.
trans-unit.target: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.
trans-unit.note: Não é raro ocasiões onde precisamos sortear alguém, com esse aplicativo fica fácil. Basta adicionar a faixa de números a serem sorteados e ele fará o trabalho para você. Experimente.

trans-unit.source: A game can destroy as well as to strengthen friendships. Take stronger drink, or that is closer to you, and will play the famous 'I Never ever' , where every time you've done something shown on the screen you should drink a sip. The rule is simple, the game is known, then what are you waiting? Call your closest friends for a round of 'I never ever'.
trans-unit.target: A game can destroy as well as to strengthen friendships. Take stronger drink, or that is closer to you, and will play the famous 'I Never ever' , where every time you've done something shown on the screen you should drink a sip. The rule is simple, the game is known, then what are you waiting? Call your closest friends for a round of 'I never ever'.
trans-unit.note: Um jogo capaz de destruir como também de fortalecer amizades. Pegue a bebida mais forte, ou a que esteja mais perto de você, e venha jogar o famoso 'Eu Nunca', onde toda vez que você já fez algo mostrado na tela você deve beber um gole. A regra é simples, o jogo é conhecido, então o que está esperando? Chame seus amigos mais proxímos para uma rodada de 'Eu nunca'.

trans-unit.source: Your feedback help me improve this app. If you like it, please, rate with 5 star so, that way, I continue to create new functions and updates.
trans-unit.target: Your feedback help me improve this app. If you like it, please, rate with 5 star so, that way, I continue to create new functions and updates.
trans-unit.note: Seu feedback ajuda a melhorar este aplicativo. Se você gosta dele, por favor, avalie-o com cinco estrelas para que eu continue trabalhando em novas funções e atualizações

trans-unit.source: Now you can know, right in your phone, where the Olympic torch is going to be in Brazil.
trans-unit.target: Now you can know, right in your phone, where the Olympic torch is going to be in Brazil.
